easy.q: I have a tail but no body. I come out at night and shine with a light. What am I?

medium.q: I am a word of letters three; add two, and fewer there will be. What word am I?
medium.hint: Sound it out or play with letters

hard.q: Three siblings share a pie. The first eats half, the second eats a third, the third eats a quarter. How much of the pie is left?
hard.hint: Use common denominator to compare shares
